title: 3 and Out - Jets/Giants GM Pressure, AJ/Deebo Leverage, Headlines + Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Jets/Giants GM Pressure, AJ/Deebo Leverage, Headlines + Mailbag
description:
John discusses both the Jets and Giants entering the draft in full rebuild mode, why AJ Brown, Deebo Samuel and Terry McLaurin have holdout leverage, how the Packers would benefit from having an owner, why John isn’t interested in watching USFL games, and why Apple looking into NFL package rights should terrify TV networks. He also looks at today’s top headlines, and answers questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
